fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Thundering Pulse, Sharpshooter’s Oath, Prototype Crescent, Hamayumi, Blackcliff Warbow

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)**Normal Attack: Sharpshooter
**2)** Elemental Skill: Explosive Puppet
**3)** Elemental Burst: Fiery Rain

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: The most important part of this play style is to make up for the low scalings on her charged shot by building up high CRIT DMG and consistantly landing headshots for guarenteed crit. Elemental Mastery sands is conditionally better, but she must be in a melt or vape team.
